fields.summary: Cannot fill a tableViewRow with another view to 100% width (clipping)

issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Android: remove padding on sides of tableView

comments.body: Please solve it. It is a big problem for us. Are there some way to fix it by me? Thanks in advance. I wait you contact, Thanks. Pablo.

I found my own work around to this issue. Try adding your tableview to a view that is the entire width of the window and set the left and right to '-5px' or '-5dp'. that gave me the result I was looking for.

Tested with 1.8.0.1.v20111205164258 v8/rhino on
Galaxy 10.1 (3.1)
Droid 1 (2.2.2)
Nexus S (2.3.6)
Emulator (4.0)
